code: import React,{useState,useEffect}from'react';import axios from'axios';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function CurrentTemperature(_ref){let{userId}=_ref;const[temperature,setTemperature]=useState(null);useEffect(()=>{const fetchTemperature=async()=>{try{const response=await axios.get(`https://backend-4uac.onrender.com/latest-temperature?usuario_id=${userId}`);setTemperature(response.data.temperature);}catch(error){console.error('Error fetching temperature:',error);}};fetchTemperature();},[userId]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"current-temperature",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{className:"temperature-location",children:"Temperatura actual de tu alberca:"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{className:"temperature-value",children:temperature!==null?`${temperature}Â°C`:'Loading...'})]});}export default CurrentTemperature;
